line_1: Thence with her livid self-devouring snakes
line_2: Pale Envy flies; her quiver Slander breaks:

line_1: Guilt, and the Day disturb the wily Snakes,
line_2: And Urchins hide their Theft in thorny Brakes.

line_1: Or lash his quivering flesh with twisted snakes;
line_2: Or plunge him deep in blue sulphureous lakes;
